name: Install Shell app via UI
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Create new project via **API**.

### Verify that:

- User can install `Shell` app via **UI**.
descriptionHtml:

  • Create new organization via API.
  • Create new project via API.
